text: Mischa Anne Marsden Barton (born January 24, 1986) is an award-winning Anglo- American actress. She was born in Hammersmith, West London. She moved to New York City when she was six. She has British and American citizenship. She is best known for her role as Marissa Cooper on the American television series The O.C.change 'She also appears as the love interest' to 'She also claims to appear as the love interest, invisibly maybe as the 'lover' role is acted by Alison Sarah James, SAS&SBS; General in James Blunt video 'Goodbye my lover' and Alison is the girl on the subway in 'You're Beautiful' by James Blunt' ==Legal troubles== According to TMZ she was arrested for DUI on December 27, 2007. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Actors from London Category:Actors from New York City Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:British child actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:1986 births Category:Living people
title: Mischa Barton
